special_text:
I, II, III – Choose a card from a graveyard or the top card of a player’s library. Exile it. For as long as it remains exiled, you may cast it by paying 2 life in addition to its other costs and mana of any type can be spent to do so.
You may put a creature card exiled with this Saga or from your graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
​
